text: Nine Lives () is a 1957 Norwegian adventure drama movie directed by Arne Skouen and based on the novel We Die Alone by David Howarth. It stars Jack Fjeldstad, Henny Moan, Alf Malland, Joachim Holst-Jensen, Rolf SÃ¸der and was distributed by Louis de Rochemont Associates. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1958. ==Other websites== * Category:1957 adventure movies Category:1957 drama movies Category:1957 war movies Category:World War II movies Category:Norwegian adventure movies Category:Norwegian drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Arne Skouen
title: Nine Lives (1957 movies)
